author: Amber Hughes
comment: Thank you Kroger! I have been having issues with this app for a few weeks and have updated it several times with nothing fixed. I just updated the app and it's working beautifully! Love the app with the coupons and fuel points! Please chill out on the clock list promos, there isn't a Kroger that offers it within 50 miles of me so I couldn't care less. Thanks!

author: Glenn Ognag
comment: Love the app & sure saves me money! Food,gift cards, clothing & gas savings are awesome. Would give it 5 stars but can not use Wi-Fi at local store as my security tells me it is unsafe. Even employees tell me they can not use for same reason? Duh please fix for 5 stars & a big Thank You!

author: Caitlin Gonzalez
comment: I love the Kroger app. I can download coupons so easily, and I can browse the weekly ad. Those are the main features I use, but it does a lot more. You can make grocery lists and order on Clicklist too. My one complaint is that one of the recent updates has caused the weekly ads to be cut off on the bottom. You can't see the bottom edge of the ad at all.

author: Tracy Deiser
comment: Technical difficulties ... Technical difficulties ... Loved this app before the latest update broke it! Now it's useless! Another update and still can't clip coupons. Missed another free Friday coupon.

author: Julia Carvel
comment: I adore this app. I'm a list-lover, and the fact that I can keep track of what I usually buy, how often I'm buying certain things, AND manage my shopping list so easily is all kinds of win.  Plus, I love that the app defaults to adding things to my shopping list, unlike the Kroger website, which defaults to ClickList. Thank you for re-enforcing my already cult-like brand loyalty, Kroger. =)

author: freefalling36
comment: I enjoyed the fact that this app kept me focused on my list. It also saved me a lot of time. Pick up was quick fast and easy. However there are quite a few problems with it still. There's not nutritional information for every single product. For many of the products, I can't see how much food there is in a serving. I also cannot see how many servings are in the container of food. Finally, I can't see the nutrition label. For several of the products, this information was blurred making it unreadable. When I first opened the the app, I could see what aisles products were on and now, I can no longer find the aisle  Information because it has disappeared off of my app.  Also, when I called customer service they couldn't find the information either. They also couldn't get the app to show nutrition information on every product. They also couldn't get it to show what aisles products were on for in-store shopping. It's also a real bummer that I get special coupons from Kroger for being a loyal customer, but those paper coupons can't be scanned into this app.

The previous version I had worked good. I just updated at Google's suggestion and this version is lousy. It's slow. Takes several seconds for the page to change. It sometimes crashes. I wish I could go back to the previous version.

author: Tiffany Scarlett
comment: I like the older version. Just updated this, and in version 13.5 2, in the shipping list, it now adds up the prices of the items that are unchecked and checked, whereas before, it only added up the prices of the unchecked items. This is how I budgeted my shopping trips before, but now I have to subtract the checked items that I keep in the list instead of having to search every time I want to add an item.

author: ba nanerz
comment: I signed up for Marianos coupons account but it doesn't work in the Marianos app. It works in the Kroger app. I don't have Kroger near me. I know they are affiliated but it doesn't pull up marianos stores
The upgrade runs off my screen. It's too big, items at the bottom of the page are cut off.

author: Guy Escano
comment: You can only add a limited amount of coupons on the app until it locks up, no response after emailing support?

author: Russell Beal
comment: Difficult to login, Aug 2017, still is Feb 2018

author: Elizabeth Rowland
comment: Since the latest update the entire bottom of the add, in print view, is cut off and not viewable.

author: Veronica Villegas
comment: Great app and easy to use! I use it to find coupons, find items on sale at my local Kroger, and keep track of my fuel rewards. Best grocery app so far

author: brenda51965
comment: Ad view just stinks

author: Marcia Carson
comment: Too slow to respond

author: Jennifer Toth
comment: No problems wish there was no limit of coupons to add

author: Randy Snow
comment: Nothing ready there

author: reginald brown
comment: The recent update makes it easier to navigate
First time i love getting the delivery.

author: Julie Ochs
comment: Kroger is a great grocery store.

author: Carrie Steele
comment: Awesome user-friendly

author: Scot Johnson
comment: Best app for Grocery shopping hands down. Great deals and simple to use. Have gotten the free Friday items several times, 1 of which was a $5 or $6 bag of premium dried jerky. Woohoo!!! I really like the option of making a shopping list as well.

author: cynthia McNeilan
comment: This new update I just did today is nothing but a complete NIGHTMARE! Removed most of my previously added coupons. Stalls, technical difficulties, BEYOND SLOW. Over 10 min to load 5 coupons. I don't have an hour to add new coupons or my old ones back on. I hate it. Going back to using the website unless this gets fixed asap.

I DO NOT like the new layout!!! (Edit:) Half the page has not been showing up since a few updates ago. Frustrating. Also, can not access it in the store, so I have to write down any downloaded coupons, or lists. So what is the point of being able to make lists on the site?

author: John Smith
comment: Do not update this app. Old versions were much better. This new version removed useful features, such as fuel points shown under rewards tab. This new version mainly tries to promote click list, which is useless for most users. So I uninstalled this app!

author: J U
comment: Payment processing for Clicklist is backwards to the point of not making sense. One subtotal is charged, followed by a grand total later- meaning you essentially pay twice up front. The subtotal is supposed to voided in a few days, but was not the case for me, so I was double charged and forced to dispute the transaction at my bank. Not worth using whatsoever.

author: Dena Russell
comment: There are pros and cons to this app.  I like that the app lists items I frequently buy based on my past purchases/loyalty card.  I like that I can search digital coupons and add them to my account/card. However, I don't like that it's so cumbersome to add the clipped coupon item to my shopping list.  It's way too many clicks...its an extra step to add them to the clicklist and another step to add to the shopping list. I wish if you clipped the coupon it would automatically add to my shopping list.  Then go into the shopping list and decide if I want to use clicklist or just use the list to shop myself.  It's so annoying that it almost makes me not want to shop at Kroger.

author: Laurel Justice
comment: Updated version got rid of the ability to directly download free Friday coupon. Have to go through a third party to figure out what it is and then sign in to account from third party website in order to download. Inconvenient.

author: Laurel H
comment: This is the worst app ever. Yes, the features are cool like coupons and the weekly ad, but 90% of the time, the app doesn't work. I've been trying to download some coupons for about 15 minutes now because the app wasn't working yesterday. Guess what? It isn't working today either! It's constantly experiencing technical difficulties. I'm probably just going to use their website from now on and forget about the app.

author: Jeff Slye
comment: Used to work pretty well. Now, with the past few updates, the app is incredibly slow for me. It takes a long time for it to perform any action, sometimes displaying only a blank screen while it tries to load.

author: Dan Naff
comment: Recent update has caused problems when I try to view certain things on my tablet, such as fuel points and purchase history. I have to access that info by logging into website thru my browser. This defeats purpose of mobile app. Sent 2 emails & called customer service concerning the problem and have heard nothing except that they have received the comments and will get back to me within 24 hours.

author: Amber Abernathy
comment: With the new update, you can't see the bottom of the weekly ad in print view. Very irritating. Anything kn sale at the bottom and the info on the Free Friday item are cut off.

author: Casey Herron
comment: This app is a good idea in theory. Coupons should be linked to cart. Categories of grocery items would be nice. You literally have to search what you want and can't browse items by category. If you add items to your "list" it is a task to get them in your "cart". Call me Kroger and I'll help you fix your app...

author: Kim Przybylinski
comment: Update wiped all my coupons and personalized coupons are not even visible to reselect. Very disappointed!

author: Jon Harris
comment: The latest update (Feb 2018) deleted our 200+ item shopping list. Unacceptable.

author: Kay Em
comment: Wouldn't let me log in. If I do get logged in and try to navigate to something different it logs me out and then....won't let me log in.

author: Greg Terhune
comment: Great app to simplify my shopping and help me save money!  I love the item search with the ability to see available coupons and add the items to my shopping list.

author: Bettiann Rogers Jackson
comment: Its always saying technical difficulties every time I try to click a coupon

author: Sara Monroe
comment: App has not let me download coupons for DAYS!! Tried updating, reinstalling...nothing works!! Get it together!!
